description: Detects the execution of AdvancedRun utitlity
name: Suspicious AdvancedRun Execution
query: (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"AdvancedRun.exe" OR (process.command_line:*\ \/EXEFilename\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \/Run*) OR (process.command_line:*\ \/WindowState\ 0* AND process.command_line:*\ \/RunAs\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \/CommandLine\ *))
author: Florian Roth
